attributes.action: change the motoring rules to allow cars to turn left on red at traffic lights if the road is clear.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the USA cars are allowed to turn right on red at most traffic junctions provided that the road is clear. In my experience this is effective at reducing congestion and ensuring a smoother flow of traffic.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
